ygData.subject: Wizards (Useless?)
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a 21st lvl wizard.  I can log in and spend 20 - 40 mins trying to find a group to play with. But no one ever wants a wizard.  About the only time I can
ygData.messageBody:
I have a 21st lvl wizard. I can log in and spend 20 - 40 mins trying to find a group to play with. But no one
ever wants a wizard. About the only time I can get in a group is if my friends that I know in real life are on.
Which isn't every time I play. How am I to lvl up and play the game, if this is a grouping game as they (verant)
say, when I can't find anyone to group with?

As far as I can tell the wizard is pretty much useless and I have put him on the side because I can't solo (tried
many a time) and I can't find a party that wants me.

I have a bard, necro, and SK as other chars and find groups all the time with no problem. Either we need to
start a petition or wizard will just continue to pretty much suck.

Venlaan - Mith. Marr
